extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Determine the breadth of the problem by identifying devices running unsupported operating systems and assess the risk of not upgrading.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to a Newer Operating System
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade affected devices to a newer, supported operating system to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Establish Migration Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Develop and execute a plan to systematically migrate to currently supported operating systems or employ a cloud-based service.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization unable to upgrade?

extracted_playbook.title: Contact Operating System Vendor
extracted_playbook.description: Explore opportunities for fee-for-service maintenance with the operating system vendor if unable to upgrade.
